broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain.controller

Interface MarkovChainController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarkovChainMaxNumStepController

    public interface MarkovChainController
    Controller class for running monte carlo calculations. The controller (and its implementing classes) are responsible for determining whether or not the calculation should end.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean goOn(MarkovChainMonteCarlo mc)
      Returns whether or not to continue with the calculation.

    • Method Detail

      • goOn

        boolean goOn(MarkovChainMonteCarlo mc)
        Returns whether or not to continue with the calculation.
        Parameters:
        mc - the Monte Carlo process this object is to control.
        Returns:
        true if the process can continue, false if it should stop after the current step.
